ComicInfo.Title: Obligations
ComicInfo.Series: Ghost Rider / Blaze: Spirits of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Summary: Obligations: The army comes to clean up the mess left at the carnival. They take Eli's body to his son's cabin to bury him. Vengeance follows Ghost Rider attacks. Quinn opens a portal sending him somewhere else. The rest of the group shows up at the cabin after Miranda uses her powers to make the guardsmen who caught them forget they ever saw them. John opens a box that Eli left with his son for him and Eli's head appears saying that he has left John something in the box to help him and that his son Quinn is also there to help him now. It ends with everyone standing before the graves of their loved ones.
